name: Mecha Soccer
description:
Game developer for the https://itch.io/jam/mechjam2 

Still work in progress.. there are a lot of bugs (no time to work with it before end of the jam)

To play user Arrows (ASDW) + right CTRL (shoot ball) and Right ATL(punch)

The idea is to implement a better IA and I am working on that.

Design Development and 3D Graphics
